primary

Class USSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • primary.USSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class USSensor
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class uses the sensor sensor or the side sensor , filters its result and return its values. This thread is intended to be runned multiples times with the three UltraSonic sensors
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Erik-Olivier Riendeau, 2016

      • filter

        public int filter(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> list,
         int index)
        Moving median filter. The filter always recycle the same arraylist of fixed size. It computes the median of the 2 previous and two next elements for each element in the array. Recycles the arraylist once it is full to save space.
        Parameters:
        list -
        index -
        Returns:
